definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: The Eucalyptus was the main pulp forest species in southern Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 桉树已成为湖南湘南地区栽培的主要纸浆林树种。

sentences.english: Previous experience as a pulp mill labourer within the same company is usually required.
sentences.chinese: 通常需要在同一公司内纸浆厂工人以往的经验。

sentences.english: The company's pulp manufacturing process, such as the promotion of tissue paper products.
sentences.chinese: 公司的纸浆制造工艺促进了纸巾等纸制品的发展。

sentences.english: A new method for the measurement of the kappa number of Kraft pulp with reflecting spectrum is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了采用反射光谱测量纸浆卡伯值的新方法。

sentences.english: To maintain the quality of recycled paper, it is usually mixed with virgin pulp wood.
sentences.chinese: 为了保持质量的再生纸，它通常是混合处女纸浆材。

sentences.english: Nonintegrated paper mills are using purchased pulp for their paper production.
sentences.chinese: 非综合性的造纸厂使用购买的纸浆进行纸张生产。

sentences.english: The effect of collagen and chitosan on aggregation property of pulp is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了胶原蛋白和壳聚糖对纸浆纤维絮聚性能的影响。

sentences.english: International Paper is the world's largest pulp and paper company.
sentences.chinese: 国际纸业公司是世界上最大的纸浆和纸张公司。

sentences.english: When you are ready, the pulp is mixed with water again.
sentences.chinese: 当你准备好造纸时，将纸浆与水再次混合。

sentences.english: Some meats turn to leather . Others to wood pulp .
sentences.chinese: 有些肉类变成了皮革，另一些则成了木纸浆。

sentences.english: And, in some cases, wastepaper pulp may be blended in the furnish.
sentences.chinese: 在某些情况下，可在配料中混合一些废纸纸浆。

sentences.english: Under these conditions, the brightness of pulp could be increased about 4-5 units.
sentences.chinese: 在此条件下，可将纸浆白度提高4～5个单位左右。

sentences.english: Rotation of picea asperata for pulpwood was tentatively determined as 25 year.
sentences.chinese: 初步认为云杉纸浆材培育周期为25年。

sentences.english: He continued writing for the pulps, but he had larger ambitions.
sentences.chinese: 他继续写作他的纸浆文学，但他的野心更大了。

sentences.english: Effect of oxygen delignification on bleaching pulp mill was introduced in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍氧脱木素对漂白纸浆厂的影响。

sentences.english: Also please send details of all available pulps for future marketing.
sentences.chinese: 请寄可提供纸浆的详细信息以便以后合作。
